divs: sighting details while driving in stephenville, tx, i was driving west on fm 205 and i approached a stop sign at us 281. as i eased up to the stop sign, i looked up to the southwestern horizon and saw what i believe to be 3 white lights with a yellow-ish tinge to them burning, then going out in succession. the lights were in the 8,7,6 o'clock positions, and were all burning at the same time, then extinguished in the 8,7,6 o'clock counter- clockwise direction. i continued watching that area for a few minutes, but did not see the lights again. i probably would not have even been watching the sky, except that the previous night my supervisor saw a lighted object, and described the lights coming on, then going out in succession. since i was driving at about the same time frame, i thought i would keep a look out for anything unusual. while what my supervisor described lasted no more than 5 or so seconds, what i saw as the last part of the same type event only lasted about 2-3 seconds. the manner in which the lights appeared seemed to be mechanical. the impression i got was that these were electrical and similar enough to be man made. the object did not appear to move. whatever this was, was at such a distance that i could not see any structure silhouetted from either the lights on it, or any lights around it. there are 2 radio towers southwest of stephenville, and the impression i got was that this object was past these towers. from my vantage point, the lights\ object was closer to the southern most of the 2 towers. when i saw the lights, i told my wife to look, but she did not see them. i made sure to look at the clock on my vehicle's stereo. that is how i know the time that i saw the lights.
